title: 226: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 6 (The "Fire Chris Harrison” Edition)
itunes:title: 226: Matt’s Bachelor Recap: Episode 6 (The "Fire Chris Harrison” Edition)
description:
Broads, we have something to discuss - and that is the recent TV appearance by Chris Harrison on Extra TV interviewed by Rachel Lindsay. We have a lot to say about it and we discuss that and Rachael Kirkconnell for the first 40 minutes of this episode. Then we dive into Matt James’ latest Bachelor episode - we chat the departure of MJ, the perfection of Jessenia, Serena C’s wild choice to come for Katie, falling in love with Pieper, the full carbon copy of Ari (Bekah’s) bowling date, Matt becoming Tyler C’s massage therapist, and the arrival of Heather?! 


PETITION TO REMOVE CHRIS HARRISON FROM THE FRANCHISE:https://tinyurl.com/ytmnva84


*Check out the IGTV of Taylor Nolan & Mikayla Bartholomew (of The Blckchelorettes) discussing Chris Harrison’s Interview on Taylor’s Instagram here: https://www.instagram.com/tv/CLIz6yBhblD/?utm_source=ig_web_copy_linkTaylor Insta: https://www.instagram.com/taymocha/The Blckchelorettes: https://www.instagram.com/theblckchelorettes/


Venmo Taylor: @taymocha

Venmo Mikayla: @mikayla-bartholomew

Venmo Victoria: @victoriaprice


Taylor’s Podcast “Let’s Talk About It”: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/lets-talk-about-it-with-taylor-nolan/id1321043863

The Blckchelorettes Podcast: https://podcasts.apple.com/us/podcast/the-blckchelorettes-with-vic-and-mi/id1549622003

Broads, we have something to discuss - and that is the recent TV appearance by Chris Harrison on Extra TV interviewed by Rachel Lindsay. We have a lot to say about it and we discuss that and Rachael Kirkconnell for the first 40 minutes of this episode. Then we dive into Matt James’ latest Bachelor episode - we chat the departure of MJ, the perfection of Jessenia, Serena C’s wild choice to come for Katie, falling in love with Pieper, the full carbon copy of Ari (Bekah’s) bowling date, Matt becoming Tyler C’s massage therapist, and the arrival of Heather?!
